trans-unit.source: Creates a TextureBrush object based on an image, a wrap mode and a defining rectangle

seg-source.mrk: Creates a TextureBrush object based on an image, a wrap mode and a defining rectangle

target.mrk: Creates a TextureBrush object based on an image, a wrap mode and a defining rectangle

trans-unit.source: Leftmost coordinate of the image portion to be used by this brush

seg-source.mrk: Leftmost coordinate of the image portion to be used by this brush

target.mrk: Leftmost coordinate of the image portion to be used by this brush

trans-unit.source: Uppermost coordinate of the image portion to be used by this brush

seg-source.mrk: Uppermost coordinate of the image portion to be used by this brush

target.mrk: Uppermost coordinate of the image portion to be used by this brush

trans-unit.source: Width of the brush and width of the image portion to be used by the brush

seg-source.mrk: Width of the brush and width of the image portion to be used by the brush

target.mrk: Width of the brush and width of the image portion to be used by the brush

trans-unit.source: Height of the brush and height of the image portion to be used by the brush

seg-source.mrk: Height of the brush and height of the image portion to be used by the brush

target.mrk: Height of the brush and height of the image portion to be used by the brush

trans-unit.source: [optional] Wrap mode that specifies how repeated copies of an image are used to tile an area when it is

seg-source.mrk: Wrap mode that specifies how repeated copies of an image are used to tile an area when it is

target.mrk: Wrap mode that specifies how repeated copies of an image are used to tile an area when it is

trans-unit.source: 1 - Tiles are flipped horizontally as you move from one tile to the next in a row

seg-source.mrk: 1 - Tiles are flipped horizontally as you move from one tile to the next in a row

target.mrk: 1 - Tiles are flipped horizontally as you move from one tile to the next in a row

trans-unit.source: 2 - Tiles are flipped vertically as you move from one tile to the next in a column

seg-source.mrk: 2 - Tiles are flipped vertically as you move from one tile to the next in a column

target.mrk: 2 - Tiles are flipped vertically as you move from one tile to the next in a column

trans-unit.source: 3 - Tiles are flipped horizontally as you move along a row and flipped vertically as you move along a column

seg-source.mrk: 3 - Tiles are flipped horizontally as you move along a row and flipped vertically as you move along a column

target.mrk: 3 - Tiles are flipped horizontally as you move along a row and flipped vertically as you move along a column

trans-unit.source: a pointer to a new TextureBrush object.

seg-source.mrk: a pointer to a new TextureBrush object.

target.mrk: a pointer to a new TextureBrush object.

trans-unit.source: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

seg-source.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

target.mrk: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

trans-unit.source: After you are done with the object, call _GDIPlus_BrushDispose() to release the object resources.

seg-source.mrk: After you are done with the object, call _GDIPlus_BrushDispose() to release the object resources.

target.mrk: After you are done with the object, call _GDIPlus_BrushDispose() to release the object resources.
